title: Perma Banned......
body:
Hello Rito, Today I was unbanned and banned again. But this time permanently. I Know you would not know this but I do have Aspergers, And I was banned for being "Toxic" Now I will admit I was being "Toxic" But that is because my bot lane was Feeding and being absolute trolls. Which made me very angry.
So I lashed out on them with very "Toxic" Things. I would like to speak to someone about getting this dealt with. I have spent heaps of money on league and spent heaps of time. Sometimes I never went outside to play league. BUT now I am banned for being a Idiot. 

Please get someone to come out and speak to me about this Situation, I Am very sad and angry because my teammates were also being "Toxic"
Once again please get someone to speak to me about dealing with this. #UNBANJAKKNIFEZ #LOVEYALL
Thank you and goodbye.
~Jak

replies.body:
If you were toxic, you were toxic. No excuse. 
Even if your teammates were, simply mute and report them after the game ends. If you have a bad temper and decide to trashtalk back without having to, that's your own fault. 
If your team is so-called "feeding" don't point it out and use it as an excuse to your loss all game, encourage them / give tips. I despise immature brats who blame a single person for doing bad early the entire game because of their kda, don't be that guy.
That's all, good luck on getting the new account up, never too late to do it.
lool, I Actually made 2 accounts after this and they all got banned for the same shit. that's 60 bucks or more down the fucking drain. 0-0

lol all i can say is good luck, you were banned for being toxic, you wont get your account back. aspergers is not an excuse. If you cant control it in an online setting where you have to type things out, instead of just blurting them out, its not riots fault and they will probs not give your account back.

GG no re

His team was toxic first and anyone who says '2 wrongs don't make a right' clearly is a moron who hasn't read a bible or realised that gaoling people IRL is actually illegal too. You can't delegate rights you don't have, to the government. So if you don't have a right to imprison anyone under any circumstances guess what? Neither do they. 

Wake up to the fact Riot are just banning victims and victim-blaming aassholes
You are fucking awesome. ( I Have never read the Bible too. )
I Also want to point out that my team was feeding xDD

I Actually got one already. lvl 15 and getting there.
Never gonna get lvl 5 Renger tho :(
